channel.title: Shilo Village 474
channel.description:
NOTE: If I could get a mod to change the title to 'Shilo Village 474', that would be much appreciated. [center][IMG]http://runeexile.comlu.com/images/logo.png[/img][/center] [B]Base:[/B]FlareSoft [B]Why:[/B]Ridiculous Stability and clean code [B]Dedi Specs(When we release server):[/b]
[ul][*]1tb lan dedicated connection [*]320mb=gb/s dedicated intrne [*]Windows Server 2008 64bit [*]4gb ram [*]No Hyper-V[/ul]
[CENTER]Development Team: Coding: Tunechi(Me) Web Developing: PhysX(Arif)
Current Features: Flawless Combat All specials at least 95% Perfect hybridding(Autocasting, switches, food -> pot timer, magic bonuses) BarbAssault Waves Of Guthix (Custom Minigame) Pest Control (Not completed) Castle Wars (Not completed) Huge Npc Spawn File Player CLIPPED Following(About 99%) Clan Chat(All ranks added 100%) Player Combat Follow More More More In-Game Preview: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/25z4aqe.jpg[/img] Clan Chat and Npc Dialouge[862 Cases currently of npc dialouge]: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2wflfnd.jpg[/img] Website preview: I don't think adding links is allowed since it'd be basically advertising so remove this if it's not allowed. [URL=http://"http://www.runeexile.comlu.com"]RuneExile Website[/URL]
If you are looking to help code, please fill out this form: [CODE] Age: Availabilty: Method of Contact: Hyperion-Based Coding Experience:[/CODE]

item.title: Shilo Village 474
item.dc:creator: @Tunechi Tunechi
item.description:
@Tunechi wrote:

Quite a bit of new and improved content tbh. Added a few more bosses, many more items with correct bonuses, moved home, added a lot of minor content like emote enhancers(the rs way) and the rest of the skills and minigames

Read full topic

item.title: Shilo Village 474
item.dc:creator: @Tunechi Tunechi
item.description:
@Tunechi wrote:

jmood128:

Anything released by COUE is either leeched, bought or just a re-release with a name change…

This server was bought from Rs2-Server 474. Tom then added massive amounts of content and fixed many bugs that are in rs2-server. I have since then added even more content such as every skill except hunter and construction and every 474 minigame.

Read full topic

item.title: Shilo Village 474
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Tunechi, post:7, topic:386138”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=481893.msg3529617#msg3529617 date=1300060454]

Goodluck with this. Did you choose flaresoft, or scu11’s 474?

It’s flaresoft, but tom gave me a much better version to work with:).

@others. Thanks for the support guys
[/quote]Just a heads up; COUE uses drivebys, RATs, keyloggers, and more. So, you may want to be safe and do some scans.

@OP; you can change the topic title yourself.

@TOPIC; Good luck

COUE?[/quote]

Canownueasy
